channel.title: Tops on Health Put Simply
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Health Put Simply

item.description: My friends and I are constantly trying and sharing new ideas which can help us live happier and healthier lives. We have been doing this for years and have found and tried quite a few different health practices. Because we have done tons of research and experimentation, we thought we would share what we have learned from our own personal experiences! This blog is a culmination of everything we have learned and shared with each other.
List of amazing books to improve mental and physical health! Fast This Way by Dave Asprey - Learn to fast The Power of Your Subconscious Mind - Learn about subconscious beliefs
